location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Ext 866/45 'Request for information about commercial relations and restrictions against British and Foreign business interests in countries which have passed from a dependent to a foreign status'

physicalDescription.extent: The file's contents are arranged in approximate chronological order from the rear to the front of the file.

Foliation: the foliation sequence (used for referencing) commences at the front cover with 1, and terminates at the inside back cover with 18; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: The file consists primarily of letters and telegrams between the India Office and the Commercial Relations and Treaties Department of the Board of Trade. It concerns information demanded from the Government of India regarding commercial relations and restrictions against British and foreign business interests in countries that have passed from a dependent to sovereign status.

name.namePart: Indian Political Service, External Affairs Department
Board of Trade, Commercial Relations and Treaties Department, Imports and Exports Licensing Section
